title: Cross country runner
creator_credit: Department of Theatre Arts, University of California and Mark McCarty
brief_description: A light-hearted allegorical spoof of modern society, depicting the trials and tribulations of a cross-country runner who takes time out from a race to visit friends and family. Cast includes David Aldrich.
